title: Inspire: Watch Face for Wear

descriptionHTML:
Inspire is a minimalistic, beautiful watch face for Android Wear. It turns your smartwatch into a source of inspiration by displaying motivational quotes right on your wrist!
Every day, new and original quote will help you stay productive and happy.

Always be inspired and help others around you be happy and productive with Inspire watch face. Time has never been so pleasant before!

Features

★ Stylish & readable design
★ Unique inspirational quotes, every day
★ Works great on round and square devices
★ 24/12 time format
★ Battery efficient
★ Supports round & rectangular Android Wear devices

Compatible with the following smartwatches

• LG G/R Watch
• Samsung Gear Live
• Motorola Moto 360
• Asus ZenWatch
• Sony Smartwatch 3

How to use

- Install Inspire
- Open Android Wear companion app
- From Watch faces choose Inspire
- Greatness awaits you!

Inspire is completely FREE!
comments: Meh You want a watch face I guess u got one
